footer.tagline: Empowering innovation with cutting-edge technology solutions for the future.
about.title: Pioneering the Future of Software Solutions
about.subtitle: We build innovative solutions that transform how people and businesses engage with digital commerce.
about.story.p1: Founded in 2024, SoftNovaX Solutions was born out of a vision to bridge the gap between cutting-edge technology and practical business applications.
about.story.p2: Our mission is to bring AI, blockchain, and modern engineering together to deliver accessible, efficient, and sustainable products.
hero.kicker: Startup with a revolutionary ecommerce platform
hero.subtitle: We're a startup with a revolutionary ecommerce product, plus we develop web and mobile apps of all kinds. Our team brings 10+ years of experience to every project.
products.title: Revolutionary ecommerce + custom apps
products.subtitle: We're building a game-changing ecommerce platform, plus we develop web and mobile apps of all kinds — from SaaS to marketplaces to enterprise solutions.
features.title: Outcomes that matter
features.subtitle: We ship measurable results: faster sites, higher conversion and fewer regressions.
contact.title: Have an app or store to build?
contact.subtitle: Tell us about your product and goals — we’ll reply within one business day.
contact.form.name: Name
contact.form.placeholder: What are you looking to build?
toast.sent.desc: We'll get back to you shortly.
team.title: A startup with 10+ years of experience
team.subtitle: We're a growing startup founded by three different characters with shared roots in Uruguay and spread across the globe. Though we're a startup, our team brings over 10 years of combined experience developing web and mobile apps. We're building a revolutionary ecommerce platform while also crafting custom apps of all kinds. Our mission? Make ecommerce accessible to everyone — no matter where you are, what you sell, or how big your budget is.
team.value1.title: Global reach, local heart
team.value1.desc: From Uruguay to the world — we build apps that work everywhere, for everyone.
team.value2.title: Ecommerce for all
team.value2.desc: Democratizing online commerce with tools that scale from startups to enterprises.
team.value3.title: Growth together
team.value3.desc: We succeed when you succeed. Our success is measured by your growth.
team.tagline: Small team, big impact. Building the future of commerce, one app at a time.
